---
title: 'Misc Apps'
---

## Other 3rd Party Apps
This is a collection of different apps created and shared in our Discord.

### Inkita
Inkita is a dedicated Android client for Kavita. 
Download [here](https://github.com/dom-53/Inkita)

### Kamare
kamare is a manga reader plugin for KOReader that connects to Kavita.

This KOReader plugin provides a seamless way to read manga from Kavita without going through OPDS, featuring a custom renderer that also supports long-strip formats commonly used in manhwa.
Download [here](https://github.com/fpammer/kamare.koplugin)

### Discord Bot
A Discord bot that integrates with your Kavita server, allowing you to browse and read content directly within Discord.

Download [here](https://github.com/0xGingi/kavita-discord-reader)
